components.hint:
It is your landlord's responsibility to keep the property free from damp and mould. However, you also have a responsibility to ensure you do not cause a damp or mould problem. 

Select all that apply.

items.label: The damp is causing, or aggravating, a health problem
items.name: auto_name__24

items.label: Damp or mould is growing on the walls or ceiling
items.name: auto_name__54

components.legend: Damp or mould is growing inside
